name: HALL OF GAMES
description:
A small WarioWare clone made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51. Made this one in the custom game engine I’ve been working on for a bit, which of course slowed down progress on the game versus if I’d used Unity or something but it was fun 😊

Play a series of minigames as they appear faster and faster. WASD and J to play.
